entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being lost, covered in soot, and wearing broken glasses. He is trying to get out of the shop quickly.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is mentioned as a place that Harry recognizes, but the current location he is in is not it.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is described as someone Harry does not want to meet when he is in his current state.

entities.name: mr. malfoy
entities.description: Mr. Malfoy is described as having a pale, pointed face and cold grey eyes, making him identical to Draco Malfoy.

relationships.description: Harry recognizes Diagon Alley but is currently not in it.
Draco Malfoy appears on the other side of the glass, and Harry tries to avoid him.
Mr. Malfoy is described as Draco's father.
